title.no: Sequential Circuits Pro-One gjennom en Korg MS-20
title.en: Running Sequential Circuits Pro-One through a Korg MS-20

content.no:
Kjører lyden fra en Sequential Circuits Pro-One gjennom en Korg MS-20 og styrer dens tonehøyde. Lyden fra synthene er uprosessert  bortsett fra litt klang fra en Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978 som er lagt på.
Instrumenter: Sequential Circuits Pro-One og Korg MS-20.
Effekter: Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
content.en:
Running a Sequential Circuits Pro-One through the Korg MS-20 and controlling its pitch with the audio.
The audio from the synthesizers is unprocessed except a small amount of reverb is added from the Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978.
Instruments: Sequential Circuits Pro-One and Korg MS-20
Effects: Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978

thumbnailDescription: A Sequential Circuits Pro-One synthesizer and a Korg MS-20 synthesizer being played

name.en: Unison with 4 oscillators in 3 different octaves

content.no:
Et utdrag fra Warszawa av David Bowie og Brian Eno spilt på en Mellotron M4000D og en Sequential Circuits Pro-One.
Instrumenter: Sequential Circuits Pro-One og Mellotron M4000D.
Effekter: VanAmps - Sole-Mate Jr. og Chase Bliss Audio & Meris - CXM 1978.
Innspillingsutstyr: Fostex X-28H.
content.en:
An excerpt from Warszawa by David Bowie and Brian Eno played on a Mellotron M4000D and a Sequential Circuits Pro-One.
Instruments: Sequential Circuits Pro-One and Mellotron M4000D.
Effects: VanAmps - Sole-Mate Jr. and Chase Bliss Audio & Meris - CXM 1978.
Recording equipment: Fostex X-28H.

thumbnailDescription: A Mellotron M4000D with a  Sequential Circuits Pro-One synthesizer on top being played
